actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to modify the boundary of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore, to remove the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to construct and administer scenic roads as part of such National Lakeshore, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Modifies the boundaries of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore in Michigan. Repeals the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to procure, construct, and administer land for scenic roads within such lakeshore.

titles.title: A bill to modify the boundary of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore, to remove the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to construct and administer scenic roads as part of such National Lakeshore, and for other purposes.
